content: Hello, I need some help with my heating system. Can you assist?
Hello! This is XYZ home services. Before we proceed, may I please have your name?
My name is Mary. But wait, I think I might have the wrong company. I actually called to reach a different heating service.
No worries, Mary. I understand. Would you like me to provide you with some local heating service contacts, or should I mark this number as a wrong number for XYZ?
Please just mark it as a wrong number. Thank you!
Thank you, Mary. I am marking this as a wrong number. We will not contact you again. Have a good day!
